definition[0]: to make people stop respecting or trusting someone or something
example[0]: The company’s lawyers tried to discredit her testimony.
definition[1]: to make people stop believing in a particular idea
example[1]: His theories have now been discredited.
definition[2]: the loss of other people’s respect or trust
example[2]: The behaviour of fans has brought discredit on English football.
example[3]: To his discredit, he knew about the problem but said nothing.
